question: A colourless discharge comes out when i kiss my husband
answer:
QUESTION

1.when my husband touches me or kisses me a colorless liquid comes out from my privert parts even without intercourse. I want to know whether it is farl to bath at this point.

2. when I go to washroom I find a yellowish substance in my underwear. i have not had any bad feelings or done anything. It just comes out from privert parts. Is is farl to bath at this point.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

1. The emission is Mazi which is impure and invalidates only wudhu. Ghusl does not become compulsory.

2. The emission is impure and breaks wudhu only. The ghusl will remain intact.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
